abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Shoot a ball of fire that deals damage.

abilities.name: Immortal
abilities.description: Fernando prevents any nearby deaths. Fernando and allies within 70 ft cannot be brought below 100 HP for 4s

abilities.name: Shield
abilities.description: Expand your shield to block 2500 damage. Cannot attack.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Dash forward at great speed. Removes all debuffs on use
